name: Economic Sanctions Tactics
description: Strategies for leveraging economic power as a means of warfare.

cards.title: Strategic Use of Sanctions
cards.description: Understanding the impact of financial restrictions on global actors.
cards.bulletpoints: Case studies on U.S. sanctions, impact on adversaries, countermeasures
cards.summaryText: Dissect landmark U.S. sanction campaigns to gauge economic pressure points, anticipate adversary workarounds, and tune restrictions for maximum geopolitical leverage.

cards.title: Bypassing and Countering Sanctions
cards.description: Methods countries use to evade and counteract sanctions.
cards.bulletpoints: Cryptocurrency laundering, offshore banking, black market trade
cards.summaryText: Map how targets wash funds through crypto, offshore havens, and shadow markets so defensive teams can flag evasion pipelines and tighten enforcement.
